description: If there is one thing that is certain in all business, it is uncertainty. Adapted from the book written by Stephen R. Covey, author of the best-selling title The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, and Robert Whitman, CEO of FranklinCovey, this mobile App is about four essentials for consistent performance through good times and bad. The two Harvard MBA graduates guide users on Excellent Execution, High Trust Levels with all Stakeholders, Achieving More with Less, and Transforming Fear into Engagement. These principals can help companies win regardless of the turbulence and change in the world. Intuitive design makes the App easy to read, search, and browse. Bookmark your Favorites to come back for a review anytime.
